title: Homeward Bound
description: SURVIVORS IN A WORLD GONE HIDEOUSLY WRONG...Ryan Cawdor's post-holocaust odyssey across America is about to come full circle - Ryan Cawdor is going home.Forced away from Front Royal years earlier by a power-mad brother who had already committed fratricide, Ryan had roamed a devastated America searching out the small pockets of life where civilization was being reborn.Emerging from a gateway in the ruins of New York City, Ryan decides to put his own house in order - it's time to avenge the deaths of his father and older brother.Accompanied by Krysty Wroth and J.B. Dix, Ryan Cawdor comes face-to-face with the harsh reality of post-nuclear America. In the Deathlands, honor and fair play are words of the past. Vengeance is a word to live by.
author: James Axler
